summary: This is an email from attorney Christian Everdell to Jeff Pa liuca and Laura Menninger, with a courtesy copy to an unspecified recipient, transmitting a Touhy request letter addressed to the Assistant Attorney General (AAG). The email seeks facilitation of the request and includes confidentiality and privacy notices.

persons.name: Christian Everdell
persons.context: The sender of the email, an attorney at Cohen & Gresser LLP, who is following up on a phone call and submitting a Touhy request.

persons.name: Jeff Pa liuca
persons.context: A primary recipient of the email, copied on the Touhy request correspondence.

persons.name: Laura Menninger
persons.context: A primary recipient of the email, copied on the Touhy request correspondence.

connections.description: Everdell is sending a Touhy request and correspondence to Pa liuca, indicating a professional legal or administrative relationship.
Everdell is sending a Touhy request and correspondence to Menninger, indicating a professional legal or administrative relationship.

events.title: Touhy Request Submission
events.description: Attorney Christian Everdell sends an email transmitting a Touhy request letter addressed to the Assistant Attorney General (AAG), seeking facilitation from the recipients.

keyFacts: A Touhy request (a request for testimony or documents from a federal employee) is being made to the Assistant Attorney General (AAG).
The request is being facilitated by attorney Christian Everdell of Cohen & Gresser LLP.
The email is marked as confidential and includes a privacy notice, indicating sensitive legal correspondence.
